MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA10 postcode area of Troon. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:08pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Loans North substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:56pm on Saturday, 26 December 2020
